moves.1. e4: This is a great game that i played few weeks....I started with e4.
moves.2... Nc6 3. Bc4: I like to play the bishop in that square..
moves.3... f6: f6? A weak move i think....Better would be Nf6..
moves.4... g5: And then g5? I don't think that's a great move...It makes king's side weaker...
moves.5. b3: b3? I don't know what i was thinking really...I usually play d3 or c3...
moves.5... g4: g4? He continues to play with pawns and attack....
moves.6. Nh4: I moved it in that square...I usually play with more defensive players...
moves.6... Nh6: Awkard move i guess....What do you think?
moves.7. d3: To open the line for my bishop...
moves.8. Bxh6 Bxh6: I decided to exchange our pieces to weaken more his king's side...
moves.9. Nf5: This is the best place for my knight...
moves.10... d5: To push my bishop...b3 was a bad move in the beginning...
moves.12. Re1: I guess that was a fine move but know i'm thinking of f3 as a better one....What is your opinion?
moves.13. d4: Now d4 is coming...I was quite confused with that game, and didn't  have a clear plan in my mind...But so far i believe i'm doing quite good...
moves.13... e4: e4 then...He has a nice centre but his defence is not the greatest...
moves.14. c4: Time to attack to that pawn...
moves.14... Qxf5: That was a logical move cause the pawn was exposed...But i found a nice plan in my mind!
moves.15. cxd5: I took the pawn hoping to take it back...
moves.16. Bc4: Bc4! A nice move tha will give me advantage!
moves.18. Rxe4+: But now the rook will do a great job!
moves.19. Rxd4+: Nice move! Check and take a piece too!
moves.20. Bxg8: I exchange my bishop for his rook...What do you think of that?
moves.20... Rxg8 21. Nc3: Now i open the knight releasing the other rook as well!
moves.23. Rd7+: Another check to push his king in the corner...
moves.24. Re4: I move my rook....His bishop is totally outplayed here....
moves.27. g3: g3 is better than gxh3 i guess!
moves.28. Nd1: Now i have a plan for checkmate...
moves.29. Ne3: Nice square for my knight...He blocks the g4 square...
moves.29... f4: f4??? i was expecting that move desperately!
moves.30. Rd5+:
Check and the game is over!!! I hope you liked it! It was a strange game for me but i think i responded and played pretty well...
What do you think?
Wait for comments and rating!

gameName: A really strong game...I love it! Check it out!
